compatibility.notes: RSCPL allows for linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, but care must be taken to comply with the terms of the license.

key_requirements: Comply with the terms of the Ricoh Source Code Public License.
Ensure that any modifications are clearly stated and the source code is made available.
license.name: RSCPL
obligations: You must disclose the source code of any modifications made to the Governed Code.
You must include a copy of this License with any distribution of the Governed Code.
You must include copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the Governed Code.
You must include a notice stating any changes made to the original code.
